name: A. Cifera
statement:
When Petya went to school, he got interested in large numbers and what
they were called in ancient times. For instance, he learned that the
Russian word "tma" (which now means "too much to be counted") used to
stand for a thousand and "tma tmyschaya" (which literally means "the tma
of tmas") used to stand for a million.Petya wanted to modernize the
words we use for numbers and invented a word that represents number .
Moreover, stands for number , stands for and so on. All numbers of this
form are called , and the number’s importance is the number of articles
in its title.Petya’s invention brought on a challenge that needed to be
solved quickly: does some number belong to the set ? As Petya is a very
busy schoolboy he needs to automate the process, he asked you to solve
it.
